svcsubproc.title: Destination Sign Lighted (Optional)
svcsubproc.para: The backlit glass destination sign may be removed if broken. Access to lighting of destination board is from interior of bus above windshield header. The procedure for removal of the glass destination board is as follows:

warning.para: To avoid property damage, personal injury, or death, park the vehicle on a flat level surface, set the parking brake, chock the wheels, and turn the engine off.

step1.para: Using a straight plastic flat tool, release the lace from the destination sign mounting rubber seal.

Carefully remove broken glass on destination sign if applicable. A cover should be utilized to cover engine and component parts from broken glass that may separate during removal of glass destination board.
Discard the seal if necessary and replace with new.
Follow same procedure for rear destination board if required.
